name: Slime Blaster
description:
Navigate the arena and capture beacons while blasting your way through wave after wave of enemies. You're outnumbered, but you can slow down time to even the odds.

Buy upgrades for the current run at the shop. Rack up kills to unlock permanent perks. Capture 20 beacons to summon the final boss!

CONTROLS:

Mouse - Aiming.

WASD - Movement.

Left Mouse - Fire Primary.

Right Mouse - Launch Saw Blade.

Hold Shift - Slow Time.

Escape - Pause.
